name: Snekky - The Video Game
description:
Snekky - The Video Game is about love, hate and conquest this makes one of the best video games ever.

Runs on ZDoom/GZDoom

I'm sorry for the lack of an option for PayPal users, if you are desperate to get the game I can get something organized.

Use our GoFundMe to support future DLC and maybe a Deathmatch  Multiplayer

https://www.gofundme.com/f/uploading-snekky-the-video-game-through-steam?utm_source=customer

Without your donation we can't know if you want more of Snekky's stories

(Please make actual criticism we all know the game isn't what it should be now in its current state.)
